name: Operation 17
description:
Operation 17

"Several objects emitting heavy electromagnetic signals have been picked up in Class A planet [REDACTED]'s arctic region. We can't get any signals through to our on planet operatives. I've requested to send in a Federation operative to check the situation out to find whatever is blocking our transmissions and take them out utilizing extreme heat and freezing tools attached to a bio-suit. Under no circumstance is the operation to come into contact with planet natives under Federation law."

*All sound effects and fonts used from opengameart.org under Creative Common licenses.*
